Who We Are

Konvex.io is a full-service data consultancy, capable of independently undertaking data projects from ideation to deployment. We use statistics, machine learning and artificial intelligence, combined with sound data engineering practices to solve complex problems. Our commitment is to provide scalable solutions tailored to address the needs of our clients.

Contact Us

Services

Data Science

We develop machine learning models and ensure they are deployed smoothly and successfully. Our capabilities include computer vision, natural language processing, and predictive analytics. These tools are leveraged to elevate your business and ultimately increase revenue.

Data Engineering

We maximize data efficiency by optimizing databases and data warehouses. Big data is handled by building reliable ETL pipelines. This data can be streamed to create real-time dashboards/visualizations and address business intelligence needs.

Cloud Architecture

Whether you are migrating existing on-premise infrastructure, or designing a new cloud based app from scratch, our certified cloud architects will plan out a dependable cost-efficient solution for your needs. We create the necessary DevOps infrastructure to let your team run smoothly.
